## Desktop Goose: A Fun Addition to Your Computer!

Are you tired of your boring desktop? Want to add some fun and mischief to it? Introducing Desktop Goose!

### What is Desktop Goose?

Desktop Goose is a software program created by Sam Chiet, which adds a cute and mischievous goose to your desktop. The goose will roam around, cause chaos, and even steal your cursor! 

### Features

Here are some of the fun features of Desktop Goose:

- The goose will roam around your desktop, leaving footprints and knocking over your icons
- The goose will honk, flap its wings, and even quack
- The goose will steal your cursor and make it difficult for you to work
- The goose even has an Easter egg, where it will mimic your cursor and follow it around

### How to Download

To download Desktop Goose, simply visit the [official website](https://samperson.itch.io/desktop-goose) and click on the "Download Now" button. The program is available for both Windows and Mac operating systems.

### Conclusion

Desktop Goose is a fun and harmless addition to your computer that will surely bring a smile to your face. So go ahead and download it, and let the goose roam wild on your desktop!
